Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Build
    Build is an interface based on the strategy pattern for the build method
    Move
    Move is a strategy pattern interface for the move method
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildAtlas
    BuildAtlas implements the build strategy for Atlas
    BuildDefault
    BuildDefault implements the normal build strategy
    BuildZeus
    BuildZeus implements the build strategy for Zeus
    Constraint
    Constraint is the class responsible to keep trace of Hypnus and Athena.
    Game
    The class Game represents the core of the game, describing the status of the current match
    LiteGame
    Class used as a message to send to the virtual view
    MoveApollo
    MoveApollo implements the move strategy for Apollo
    MoveDefault
    MoveDefault implements the normal move strategy
    MoveMinotaur
    MoveMinotaur implements the move strategy for Minotaur
    Player
    Player is used to keep trace of a player in the match
    SerializableLiteGame
    SerializableLiteGame is a serializable version of the LiteGame class, which will be sent to the client
    Space
    Space is used to describe a game table space
    Worker
    Worker is used to describe a worker
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    God
    The God enum is the list of gods available in the game
